item.description:
Let's try out our own blades of glory with an indoor ice skating meetup!

The Northford Ice Pavillion offers a public skate from 1:00 - 2:30. The cost to skate is only $7.00, and rental is FREE if you don't have your own.

Whether you're a seasoned skater or a beginner, this is the perfect opportunity to have some fun, meet new people, and share some laughs. If anyone is interested, we can also grab some food either before or afterwards.

We will meet in the lobby at 12:45, which will give us time to chat and then hit the ice. If you get there later, my skates are blue. I have posted their website, which has directions, phone numbers, and lots of pictures of the rink. If you have any further questions, please call my cell phone at 860.227.7498

I look forward to seeing you on the ice!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the lobby.
item.name: Indoor Ice Skating
